Edward Julian Nally (1859 â€“ 1953) was a U.S. radio industrialist. Nally served as the vice president and general manager of American Marconi Company and was the first president of RCA between 1919 and 1923."The Navy and the Radio Corporation of America", from History of Communications-Electronics in the United States Navy by Linwood S.
